message:
SYSTEM: 03_SPARQL.pdf: Página 10
Unions of conjunctive queries 
Example:  
“Give me all names of co-authors or friends of Tim 
Berners-Lee 
11 
Ontological Engineering Group.  
UNIONs of conjunctive queries… 
PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/>  
SELECT ?CoAuthN ?FrN 
WHERE {  
 { [ foaf:maker <http://dblp.l3s.de/…/authors/Tim_Berners-Lee>,  
                     [ foaf:name ?CoAuthN ] ] . } 
 UNION 
 { <http://www.w3.org/People/Berners-Lee/card#i> foaf:knows ?F . 
         ?F foaf:name ?FrN } 
      } 
 
 
 
?CoAuthN 
?FrN 
"Lalana Kagal" 
"Tim Berners-Lee" 
"Dan Connolly” 
"Jim Hendler” 
… 
"Michael Hausenblas” 
"Jim Hendler” 
"Charles McCathieNevile”  
… 
Note: variables can be  
unbound in a result!
speaker: SYSTEM
